entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 11:25 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
